system.requirements:
Tier 3; Weapon Skill 40, Agility 50
Aptitudes: Agility, Offence, Slaanesh
system.effect: When making a Charge Move, the character doubles their normal charge movement (EG: Agility Bonus 3 --> Charge Move 9, Doubled to 18 by this talent).

description.value: When making a Charge Move, the character doubles their normal charge movement (EG: Agility Bonus 3 --> Charge Move 9, Doubled to 18 by this talent).
